definition: (bird species of China) great bustard (Otis tarda)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
Chinese bustard/procuress

sentences.english: Bustards are now associated with the Badger MK II for invention purposes as the BPC requirement.

sentences.english: The Great Bustard is polyphagia bird, but it feeds mainly on plants.
sentences.chinese: 大鸨是杂食性鸟类，但以植物性食物为主。

sentences.english: MK II for invention purposes as the BPC requirement.

sentences.english: These researches provide the basic and scientific information for , further research, extu-conservation, and population enlargement of Great Bustard .
sentences.chinese: 也为进一步深入的研究大鸨奠定了良好的基础。
